content.detailedDescription: On the evening of the event, i had been in the garden with my telescope and due to poor seeing, decided to pack up around 10.45pm. as i was dismantling my mount, i noticed in the distance on the eastern horizon, a strange coloured light heading towards my direction. at first i thought that it may have been a chinese lantern, but all of a sudden, the light changed shape, and before i knew it, it was nearly above me. all i could see of the object, was like a pencil line outline. coloured a golden, bright distinctive shape similar to a triangle, but more rounded. when the object past into the west, the object just completely blew me away with the speed it changed direction. still heading west, it went at a 90 degree angle up into space and was then no longer visible.
content.summary: Watched a gold ouline of a ufo travel from ne, e, direction and then it shot up into the east so quick.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in a car with three other male passengers heading away from saratoga ny heading towards utica ny. the driver spotted something in the sky asking the other passengers what it was. it was around 1:30 pm and i was sitting in the back seat when i looked at the "object" pointed out by the driver. i saw a dark cigar shaped "object" that was hovering in the distance. at first i didn't know what the "object" was but everyone in the car discussed and dismissed several options of what it could be. we ruled out a plane, helicopter, blimp and even a cloud. the car was traveling at around 50 mph and we followed this "object" for at least 10 minutes and never lost sight of it but never seeming to get closer to it. one of the passengers had a cell phone that took photos taking several photos from inside the car. the "object" seemed to keep hovering but moving slowly to the right but staying ahead of the car. we arrived in a small town (johnstown ny) and pulled the car into a store parking lot. i got out of the car taking the other passenger's cell phone taking photos from outside, the other males remained inside the car. we tried to get closer to the "object" but were now in town with stores and then neighborhoods and lost sight of the object. on our drive home we all discussed what we each saw. one of the passengers estimated the "object" at (40-50) yards in length and the driver estimated it to stay about a mile ahead of us. all the males passengers work together and have discussed our sighting since deciding to report it here. i've reviewed the photos and although they are not close-ups the "object" we witnessed does appear in the photos. i've zoomed in to the best i could and noticed something i did not see with my naked eye during my sighting. the zoom of the photo shows a "glow" on the top and bottom of the "object". since the sighting i can not stop thinking about it because i've never had a sighting before which is why i'm writing this now.
content.summary: I along with 3 car passengers observed and followed a dark hovering cigar shaped disc.

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping with two friends out on a mountainside in ireland, and we noticed a bright object in the sky. as an amateur astronomer, i had with me my celestron binoculars and a tripod. we decided to look at the object through them. 

the object appeared as a disk with lights rotating around it (blues, greens, whites and reds) - it was similar to looking at the dog star through binoculars (the weird prism effect) except this object was not moving like the stars, but  horizontally. it hovered but was slowly moving in a south-westerly direction, about 30 or 40 degrees above the horizon. we observed the object for about an hour and a half.

through the binoculars, it was possible to see the lights quite clearly, but roughly every second, the object appeared to blur, like a heat haze. this was a very regular thing and because of the tripod could not have been caused by heartbeat movement of the binoculars. to me, this was the aspect of the object that made me believe it was not a technology that i have ever seen before. the only thing it could have been was a helicopter with a set of rotating lights above the rotors, with an atmospheric effect causing the blurring. i think this is unlikely.

all three of us observed the object and the blurring effect. unfortunately i do not know if it was a large object very far away or a small on much closer. from our vantage point on the mountain, it is a reasonable guess to say the object was a minimum of 10 miles from us. sadly, none of us made a video or took any images - i am annoyed at myself for this omission. so that's it - i now look every night i can to see something like this again and am a staunch believer in the ufo phenomenon what i saw makes me believe the technology displayed by this object is far in advance of even the latest physics research/hypotheses of us humans.
content.summary: Light in sky, hovering. seen through powerful binoculars. object pulsated at approx. 1 second - appeared to blur.

content.detailedDescription: Observed by 5 people more then one object light flashed on all objects like they were communeacateing
content.summary: Observed by 5 people more then one object light flashed on all objects like they were communeacateing

content.detailedDescription: On october 18th at exactly 6pm my wife went out to walk our 2 dogs. within 5 minutes of her leaving she screamed my name to go to her. i freaked out, grabbed her gun and ran to her in the field where we walk our dogs. she pointed up and we seen lots of orbs shooting up into the air then floating towards us. we stood there in shock as one came right above us and just hovered. another one floated down and slowly flew by a motel structure that was being constructed and it's light reflected off the wood walls. i stared right at the one above us, gun in hand and the middle was round and shaped like a white bubble. there were 3 bars outside the orb connecting to an outer ring that was like a tube and in it were small balls of light going round and round on the outer tube. after standing there for what seemed like about 15 minutes. then the orb by the motel flew up and so did the one that was above us. they were joined by 2 other orbs that came from nowhere and the 4 of them flew off without sound towards denver. as they flew they gained more speed then all 4 went and kinda fanned out flying up then disappeared. me and my wife went inside and drew what we saw for comparison and it was the same. but, we did notice that it was 8pm when we went back into our apartment. no reaction from the dogs except they both sat down and watched the orbs. at first we were both shaken up but we didn't feel afraid. just never had that happen before.
content.summary: Lots of orbs. one hovered right above me and my wife while walking our dogs.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside in our back yard...He was outside with a fire going and i had just joined him. just as i sat down and looked up to the right over the trees we saw the light "go on". it was almost like something exploded or the light you see from a meteor shower when it comes really close...A burst of light or a light bulb came on.Something we've never seen before. we see planes all time. we know the difference. we know how chinese lanterns and flares look and the difference between seeing the iss etc. it did scare us for a minute..I yelled holy ***t did you see that?! and then it faded..He said he saw the light earlier and it made an "l" shaped pattern. and as he was telling me that it did it again. but it shifted, maybe about an inch over and just as bright. the second time my heart stopped because i knew this was a "new" event. we've seen lights before..Never this "kind" i kept thinking it was because we had the fire going, so were going to try it again and see if we can get the same response. it happened (blinked) maybe 6 times total but faded after the first 2 really bright bursts. there was a large plane that flew right by it and we didn't see any swift movements by it. it was a dot in the sky and the light came on..So hard to describe it unless you were there. scary..Yes. because it seemed so close or like it was going to get even brighter, maybe a star exploded? and exciting at the same time because it was "different". there is a mountain in that direction, seems to be where we see the most "action".(ie. like a star that's there stationary, and then just starts moving.) unfortunately clouds started coming in really fast after that and that was it..Couldn't see any stars or anything :(
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A light from the object like a light bulb went on super bright

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard trying to get pics of the blood moon,turned flash off on camera,when i do this it's really hard to get good pics cuz the shutter goes slow so most things get blurred. was trying different settings with no luck,i turned on the "sports" setting, with that on it takes a set amount of pics right in a row with out pressing the button, it was set on 5 at a time. still got blurred pics,so i tried to steady myself against a rain gutter, took a bunch more photos, then i decided to look at the pics in the camera to see if i got any good ones of the bloodmoon,on 1 set of 5 i noticed what seemed like a star  circling the moon, i thought maybe it was a satellite that was circling the moon,but on the pics before and after the set of 5 there's nothing.I've looked at 100's of pics of the bloodmoon on the internet and don't see anything like this set of 5. i can blow it up on my camera and it appears as a blue/green half circle. it start's at about 5 oclock,second later it's at 4 oclock,then almost 3 oclock, then 3oclock,then then alittle above 3. i'm really not sure what it is
content.summary: Object by blood moon?

content.detailedDescription: At aprox 2-215 am i was traveling east on interstate rt 80.About a half mile before the light street exit i noticed what i thoughjt was a new billboard sign along the highway'but thought it was too far back for people to easily see it from the road'and it had an aqua marine colored back end that pulsed from right to left slowly' then i noticed that it was a giant triangle shaped craft floating.It had very sharp corners and no lights on the underside.A shaft of light came out of bottom to the ground for about 2 seconds then stopped. the hair on the back of my neck stood up'and felt like i was being watched. i still cant get that image out of my head and have been drawing pic of it to try to understand what i saw.I went past a small hill hoping to see it once i passed the hill but it was not there.It was gone in seconds
content.summary: It was hovering just off of high way

content.detailedDescription: I was in winnipeg and i was around 7 years old when i  saw the tryangle in the sky. it had rainbow collors in the shape of a tryangle. i did not have a camera at the time i wish i did.
content.summary: Was a rainbow like tryangle

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette on the front porch of my home and noticed odd movement in the clouds. it changed shape and looked very solid. before the night was up i'd had ten or more above me and they chased each other and flew in the fastest i've ever seen an human aircraft go making sharp turns and pulsing off. the whole time i had a pulsating hum in my ears and felt oddly happy and content. i've had trouble sleeping since then and notice new marks on my body weekly.
content.summary: Noticed a cloud that looked strange and it absorbed into a solid sphere then before i knew it there may have been up to ten above me for hours.

content.detailedDescription: We were out on the back porch of our apartment late one night in november 2014. suddenly, everything got very, very silent. the wind stopped blowing, the insects stopped buzzing, birds stopped chirping, animals stopped rustling, even the surrounding apartments and businesses went silent. then, filling the air from every point around us all at once came a bright green light, lasting for a few perceived seconds, but we both felt as if we had lost time. then the light faded and we heard a loud boom. our vision and hearing was affected for a short time afterward, all the power in the area was out for a short time, and everything stayed eerily quiet until some time later.
content.summary: Over a few seconds, everything, wind, insects, wildlife, buildings, went absolutely still and silent. then a bright green light filled the air itself all over coming from everywhere at once.

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed at key west naval base from 1953-56.  we were docked on a saturday. at 11 a.M., i stood on the deck of my ship, off-duty, with other seamen. we heard sirens: the base went on red alert! i looked up and saw, at 10 o'clock in a clear blue sky, 6 or 7 saucer-shaped objects.  everybody saw them.  they were grayish silver. they moved slowly in perfect unison, making abrupt 90 degree turns to the left and upwards. i felt excited!  six or seven fighter jets from the nearby boca chica air station were scrambled and flew in pursuit.  when the planes got near, the objects quickly darted off diagonally to the left and disappeared in a cloud!  there was nothing published about it that i know of.  the incident seemed to be hushed up, even though the whole base had seen the objects.
content.summary: 6 or 7 saucer-shaped objects over key west in 1953, '54' or '55.

content.detailedDescription: We were down on a wooden platform that overlooks the cuyahoga river. at some point we saw what looked like a very bright star, however the light quickly faded away. we then began seeing an object moving in the sky, appearing to both hover and move in a kind of zig-zag pattern. as it moved around it would flash a white light; almost pulsating/flashing but without any obvious pattern. sometimes it was a quick flash, sometimes long. sometimes the light was very bright and other times it was dim. we observed it moving during some flashes, while it stayed perfectly still (hovering) during other flashes. it was also sometimes visible as a dark outline moving when it wasn't flashing. we also observed 4 planes flying by over the course of the 30-40 minutes we observed the unidentified craft, the planes were very obviously quite a bit lower than this craft. we watched it for about 35 minutes and over that time it didn't move too far (distance wise), always stayed within our line of site, but was moving around with no observable pattern during the entire time. when we left the area to go home it was still in the sky, blinking/flashing and moving around strangely. no pictures or video were taken due to the fact that our phone cameras aren't that great, how far away the object was, and lights from the city nearby-we believed it wouldn't have been visible enough on phone images or video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft hovered and zig-zagged across the sky, emitted a bright light that randomly pulsated/blinked in varying degrees of brightness

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Around 430pm 10.5.15 laying outside on the trampoline (i dnt jump) socking up sm sun while on the cellphone. no clouds clear blue sky. tht it wz the sun in my eyes but too shiney. sun in different direction. tht it wz a bird or my glasses where dirty. told my friend to holdon & she wz not going to believe me as i sat up. i say a plane go by. i dont live far from airport. but the object was not a plain it was very silver and shiney. it had at least 6 balls of reflective line of lights at the bottom of a triangle shape with kind round edges. i sat up told my friend i would call her back. tried to snap a pic with my fon. ddnt pic up nothing. ran in the house to get my sons to make sure i wasnt crazy. my got the binoculars and looked dead at it. my youngest saw it to. the object was way up in the sky higher that a plane. no jet stream. i wz curious if the pilot even saw it. it was very shiney. no sound just moved slowly acrossed the sky from the north headed like southeast to just south. then all of a sudden a jet flying fast coming from the west was headed towards it. it was not flying fast. clear sky until we could not see anything anymore. it was crazy. i finally got to see a damn ufo. if u would not no better if it were night i would have tht it was a star twinkling. but, no clouds near by. very clear. shiney reflective lights. smh wow....I just wish i was not so nerveous and just tried to record it. but my fon so cheap i doubt regardless it would have picked up anything that far up. idk...
content.summary: Laying down outside on cellfon tht it wz smthng n my eye r a bird. but too shiney

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio smoking a cigarette and on my tablet, and something bright caught my eye to the west  150 ft away from me.  there were 4-5 "extremely" bright lights all parallel from one another, slowly hovering towards my direction. there is a ravine behind my house that it looked like it came out of.  it stayed above the treetop for about 8 seconds then "rapidly" accelerated due north towards lake erie.  i was in awe at first because what i had seen, it is something that nobody ever gets to experience in their entire lifetime, and no one would ever believe what i described to them. right away i immediately knew that it was a ufo. there is nothing in this world that could do those things i saw.  i lost sight of the object almost immediately after it accelerated away. it was life changing.
content.summary: 5 very bright lights just appeared and hovered for a few seconds then abruptly accelerated away from me towards the lake.

content.detailedDescription: Me ,mother,brother and sister had gone to rushville and brought our cousin out to play.We went inside the house for a minute and then came out to the front yard to play.We saw the object in our barn lot i would say 100 to 150yrd away. we were mesmerized. i was standing on the right of everyone.We were all standing in a straight line.I remember glancing to my left and seeing my siblings and my cousin and catching a glimpse of my mother standing inside the screen door.The craft reminded me of a satellite made up of metal panels with different types of indentations on each panel.My cousin and sister report more of a disk shape.(mother and brother are deceased) mother did remember the incident but we never talked about it and i never talked with my brother.In fact i had forgotten about it until my cousin mentioned it to me some 13yrs or so later.The object sat in the lot and i was thinking about the movie the day the earth stood still and said to myself"well i wonder if anything is going to get out" just after i thought this the craft rose above the barn and in a second was a black dot in the sky.My cousin became afraid and wanted to go back home.I said wait a minute and went to the barn lot and observed a yellow ring of dead grass.I drove out by there a few yrs ago and now there is a pole barn on that very sight.Just recently i spoke with my cousin and she asked me if i noticed any scoop like marks on my body that had been there forever but didn't know how they got there.I told her that i have a small scoop mark on my left upper outside leg that i thought was maybe a chicken pock scar but wasn't sure.My sister also has a similar mark only on the back of her leg.My cousins and mine are in the same spot.None of us have any memory of being abducted.
content.summary: Craft landed in barn lot.Was seen by me.Mother ,brother ,sister and cousin

content.detailedDescription: We have been seeing what appears at first as stars, but when watched for awhile seem to move in every direction. tonight we were able to observe it with our binoculars. it seem to be a circle of colorful lights. we took photos , but the circular shape did not show up, it looks to be a line of lights in the photo, which made me think that it was not only spinning , but hovering and changing directions. we have seen these several times now, but not as clear as tonight. they always seem to be in the same direction. we are in northern montana. as i type it is still hovering. i wish we had our telescope.
content.summary: Seemed to be a circle of lights, object hovered and moved slightly in all directions, but when first glimpsed at looks just like a start. looked through binoculars and saw many colors and it seemed to rotate, have photos, but is a blur or trail of lights,

content.detailedDescription: I went to boyds pump to take photos of a thunderstorm to get lightening photos,  i ran out of space on my sd card so i ran home and transferred the photos i had taken to my laptop, cleared my card and went back to the same location to shoot more photos.  i got a weird feeling, like i should leave that got quite intense and i was scared, but was not sure exactly why.  when i got home i loaded my photos onto my computer, and realized there were 2 different photos that had a strange and unexplainable object in them.  the first was  yellowish colored light that appeared to be shooting out of a cloud that was a really strange shape ( the cloud was an x shape with the lower 2 legs of the x flattened to make a straight line)  and the second photo i had noticed a strange shape just under the clouds.  when i zoomed in on it i realized it was a triangle with a circle and some sort of marking that resembled almost a face on the bottom of it.   i just found it to be extremely weird so i decided to report it.
content.summary: 2 sightings in thunderstorm- 1 a light second a gold/yellow triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, driving a truck, suddenly my attention diverted light that is not otherwise there.I picked up the phone and photographed.I guess it's a flying object.I've seen such things before.
content.summary: At night over a factory that emits an extremely high level of pollution by sulfur

content.detailedDescription:
Pacific grove california; lat 36.600239, long -121.931648 at 10:58 pm pacific time on 10-04-2015; very high angle from the horizon, almost vertical (~85 deg)

beautiful clear sky; observed at least ten or more starlike flashes, one at a time, which bloomed and then faded at different random points on an linear path between cygnus and cassiopia, appearing essentially in the region from cygnus to cassiopia in almost popcorn fashion. starlike object dwelled stationary for short periods at times with out moving, indicating no constant lateral velocity or propulsion, therefore not a satellite. the starlike object would appear in one position, go out, and then appear ("pop up") in another position; second observer, my wife also observed the same phenomenon, we were both surprised; i've seen single flashes before, but nothing this numerous; no sound; starlike objects appeared to be very high altitude; no tail on the starlike objects; it's unlikely they were numerous meteorites coming straight towards me having no tail; i stopped watching when none appeared for a while; the video on my cell phone didn't show anything because of the low light intensity; if anyone else was looking at this region of the sky at the same time, they may have seen the starlike flashes; a similar occurrence was reported near cassiopia on october 19, 2014 on the abovetopsecret webasite
content.summary: Starlike flashes which bloomed and then faded near cygnus and cassiopia

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside getting ready to watch a new episode of my favorite tv show after work, and heard loud jet noises outside.  i had heard these noises before in recent years and observed a single large triangle craft flying overhead with the noises.  thinking i may be able to observe the craft again i raced outside.

once outside i was able to see the craft flying overhead much lower than it did before.  after watching the craft for a few seconds i noticed something i had not seen before; on each corner there was a glowing orange light that seemed to slowly pulse, and also this time i observed 3 craft not just one.  the 3 craft formed a triangular flight pattern and only the front craft had the light turned on for it's leading point, the other 2 craft only had the rear lights turned on.

i am not sure of any military craft that are as large as these objects that would be triangular. the outline of the craft was very clear against the starry night sky.

i observed the 3 craft fly north east of me and then begin to ascend, i attempted to wave at them to see if anything would happen but i soon lost sight of them behind the top of the trees.
content.summary: 3 large black triangles

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my balcony i noticed a flashing white light in the south (around 25 kilometers away from me) i had my camcorder handy and looked through it to see what it was, after i noticed it was flashing and irregular white light, very unlike a plane i then started filming it and after looking at it and it being such a long distance from my location i thought it might be a plane so i stopped filming after 1 minute and 32 seconds, just to be sure i went into my room to go online to view the plane finders flights in that area and to my amazement there was nothing on radar so i quickly went back outside and starting filming it again.

when i first spotted this object it was located around the mcg and traveling in a westerly direction until it reached (i think) the ascot vale suburb and then it started going toward a north/westerly direction until it disappeared out from sight into the distance.
content.summary: Ufo - melbourne 4th october 2014 7:14 pm

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my family star gazing when it appeared,it stayed in the same spot in the night sky,the wildlife around our farm went crazy,we though the object in question was a plane but it stayed in the same place,there was nothing unusual with us or the surrounding area,we lost sight of the object when it slowly faded out.
content.summary: A small blinking/pulsating light,looked like a star,hovered in same spot for a good 15 min

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my home, smoking a cigarette. i saw a flash in the sky and looked up to see nothing. less than 1 minute later, saw what i can only describe as a flying craft of some sort, circular. it flashed bright white light at differing times. sometimes it would be white to blue or white to red, other times it was only white light. at first i thought it could be a helicopter, but realized its path was changing. in between flashes of light, it would go from traveling northeast to traveling east. i then knew it was not a helicopter or plane, nor could it have been a satellite. i tried to film it with no results, but am uploading the video i took encase you have better graphics than i and can make it out. after 5 mins i realized i was probably watching a ufo. as a sky watcher, i know when i am seeing something man made. it's path was somewhat erratic. when it flashed at times, the light was very very bright, brighter than a meteor falling to earth. this is not the first time i have witnessed a ufo in this area. possibly drawn here because there is a diamond and crystal mines nearby. i know this was a ufo, alien, i'm not sure, but i am certain it was a ufo. left me feeling privileged, as i have witnessed many ufo's in this area over my lifetime, dating back to when i was very young, i am now nearly 30. i came inside the house to post on facebook so others may be able to see it and when i came back out, it was gone.
content.summary: Altitude of highest airplane, changed direction multiple times. wasn't man made.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my cousin were out side on 12/25/1963 at around 6pm playing in the dark when all of a sudden a super bright white light(a white that i have never seen before) it was about 13 stories above us and moved over us about 5 miles an hour, the whole area was lit up like day light. we watched this light move over us it seem like a 60 seconds. it then vanished like someone turned off the light. we thought it was a meteor and that it crashed so we went to look up the hill but it was to dark and we could not see past a foot. we went back to the house and i turned on the tv to see what the news had to say, but nothing, so i then called the local radio  station to see if they knew anything about a comet crashing which they said no. the crazy thing is that i remember looking at my watch seeing that it was 7pm and the time i called the radio station was around 8:30pm. it could no have taken a hour and a half to walk up the hill and back to the house. my cousin never remember the sighting, he died at 58 from a rare bone cancer that made him go from 5 feet 9 to 5 feet 2 and the looked like he was 90 years old. i have a feeling that our encounter has some missing time. this happened in ansonia, ct on 12/25/1963.
content.summary: A white light like no white ever seen before right above me and cousin that moved over us and then vanshished

content.detailedDescription:
at  2045 hrs i had thought to go outside. i went out,no shoes, put down my tailgate on my pickup truck to sit and star gaze.
 my neighbor to the south was leaving for his 3rd shift job,he rolled up to me and asked why i was sitting in the dark. i told him i wanted to watch the stars. he replied as he looked out from his side window that it was a good night for doing this since the stars seemed bright. he had just left the shared drive from our condos to the street when i turned to watch the sky in the north. i had just started to scan the sky from north to south when i spotted a semi bright object  moving rapidly southwest. 

 object was just a little larger than the stars.Moving very fast.

 as i tracked this object i also saw another bright light approaching from the south. it appeared that they were on a collision course. but when they were about (an half inch apart when holding my arm at it length) they slowed and began to circle each other. one craft was larger than the other. they had maybe made about 10-12 circles when they both stopped and started to move in a southern direction.
 a commercial jet flew below them (just as i observed all this) in a western direction.Both craft appeared to be saucer shaped of unknown size.To far away to be accurate on shape.

 also from one or both of craft there was several bright flashes, seemed directed towards earth.
then they both flew in a southern direction side by side.

 i had forgot to pick up either one of my phones when i went outside. i wanted to call my ufo friend, when out of the east i saw 2 red lights flashing.
  i could not tell what they were till they had passed about maybe a mile from south of town and from the east.

 they appeared to be fighter aircraft at about 4-5000 ft elevation and moving very fast.

 i confirmed this from hearing their jet roar when they were out of sight. they were maybe just over 1 mile away when i first saw them. they were not in afterburner as i could not see any jet flame from their engines. only lights were the rotating red on bottom  of craft. they seemed to be on an intercept course with these 2 ufo's.

 my heart was racing so fast from seeing all this.
 i went inside my home and got my phones, came back out to sit on my tailgate and call my ufo investigator friend.
i called my friend ,it went to voice mail, i left a message about what i had just saw. i decided to try again to get thru. he had just answered and told me he was just about to play message i had left. time elapsed about 6 minutes. i was trying to scan the sky while having a conversation with my friend.

  i began to briefly  repeat what message i had left when  bright lights came from the southwest traveling to northeast. it was much lower than before and it was or appeared to be a large triangle shaped craft. (my first time ever seeing this type) it appeared to be about 2 miles high now.If lower then this craft was gigantic in size like several football fields large. 

 craft was dimly lit but i could see it's large shape against backdrop of stars, i also noticed what i thought to be 2 red orbs following craft or part of craft.
 it turned out to be fighter aircraft chasing it. i estimated they all were traveling at 900-1000mph or faster since they covered what part of sky i had view of in 20-30 seconds and were out of sight.

 jets appeared to be within 1000 feet of craft and was keeping up with it,
 
 all i could hear was roar of jet engines and whine of turbofans

do not know if this tri-craft was same as craft as 1st sighting.  it was closer to ground than first two craft and was only maybe 2-3 minutes from when they were out of my sight and me coming in to get phones and this craft returning back over me to the westside of town.
 
  no other sounds could be heard from ufo. 

 i had to apologize to my friend because i was somewhat speechless, unable to describe what i was seeing and had just experienced.

 this craft was not as bright as before, but i could make out its shape against the stars. the craft did not emit any sound that i could hear. 

if craft had any lights they were on bottom and dim. it appeared to have bright light at front of craft, this is how i first saw it, but when it passed,only outline of craft against the sky.
 only sound was from military aircraft and only after they had past my home and were almost out of sight before sound was.

 i discussed what i had saw with my friend on phone and then came inside to write down all info while it was fresh in my mind. then filled out my sighting repot on mufon.

*********** this was a first for me seeing this type of craft and seeing  military jets involved.
               in past had seen military helicopters where ufo crafts had been. ************

also, why was i prompted to go outside??? this has happened several times in my past. 

glad i was obidieant to my thought of going outside, 

my only regret was not being able to capture this at night with a camera. ************
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At 2045 hrs observed 2  lights in sky.They circled each other then left in southern direction.

content.detailedDescription: Like a saucer with a glass globe with a alien on the dashboard that has a white face black eyes and about a foot tall
content.summary: ufo flew above the tree we look at each other about 5 minutes before it left. i saw other images. see photo

content.detailedDescription: I live 5 minutes from lake erie. i was having a smoke, staring at the sky.  i noticed in the northwest what looked exactly like a star but it was at least twice as big as the brightest start in the sky, and it seemed to be moving towards my direction, it was moving slightly faster then planes appear to move and this object did not fly in a straight line as it had a very prominent wobble (which was the first abnormality that caught my attention in the first place). it had no blinking lights whatsoever. fascinated, i watched this thing keep moving from nw to ne. it eventually flew right over my house when it came to a complete stop.  this object was extremely high up (again it resembled a really really big star). it stayed there way up in the sky for just a couple seconds, and then all the sudden within 3 or 4 seconds this bright star-like light grew dimmer and smaller until it just vanished, from my point of reference it looked like it stopped and then shot up and out of our atmosphere.  whatever it was it had great speed.  and then for the next 30 minutes after i saw this thing, i must have seen 30 to 40 planes fill the sky, most of them coming from lake erie.  the weird thing is :/ .. half of these planes didnt even make any sounds.  and there were planes that were way up there that were still very audible, and yet some planes that appeared to be much lower to the ground had no engine noise whatsoever!  not to mention there were like 6 planes that went by one after another, none of them made any sound, and they were like fixed ona perfect straight line, almost like a conveyer belt, they looked.. staged.  one of the planes over lake erie had a very very bright white orb-like flash that appeared right next to it, it was visible for what seemed to be a very long second.  don't know what it was.  there was also very many "shooting stars" present during this whole time as well.  thats about it... i just wanted to document this.  it was very weird
content.summary: Looked like big star, irregular wobble in its path from nw to ne. came to a dead stop.Then shot up and out of atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: sitting in my backyard appears to be a shooting star but instead of  fading it brightens at the end and flashing bright light and a smoke trail.    within a few minutes i see this like coming  light  coming towards me  not  making any sound slow an steady  light round looking  the night before i saw something similar overhead moving in a straight path appears to be a star did not have my phone with me but but my phone tonight and got a video of it
content.summary: white light star in appearance

content.detailedDescription:
After putting my daughter to sleep at 9pm est, i took the trash out front. i noticed how clear the night was and inspected the night sky. i noticed a uniquely bright object just over the tree line appearing green/red light so bright it twinkled and had streaks that were unpleasant to look at. the object hovered in the same position for 10+ minutes. i continued to observe from inside my home to see if something odd would happen. the lights suddenly dimmed to the point the object appeared as white and pinpoint like a star. it was hard to see but i watched it as long as possible, as i watched it slowly tracked to the south until i lost visual in the trees.

we are in a flight path for aircraft but this did not look or act in that manner. further, the brightness of the light was unusual. there was no noise to speak of. i though it was a bright celestial object, but knowingly was impossible because the color and intensity was by far greater than jupiter. i thought perhaps a plane but was hovering for to long and the dimmed light that did not blink and slowly tracked away from the flight path and went slower than aircraft but faster than celestial objects to the earth's movements. hoping someone else saw and reported so this may provide support for that sighting. was strange and not sure what could be.
content.summary: Super bright hovering light that eventually dimmed significantly and tracked slowly out of sight
